activate!()

activate the source. inactive sources can be ignored

active?()

returns true if the source is active, false otherwise

import(file, url = nil)

takes a url and a file to create a new source. The file is parsed by VipHandler, and the url is stored with the source.

[Source]

    # File lib/app/models/source.rb, line 25
25:         def import(file, url = nil)
26: 
27:                 @url = url
28: 
29:                 # set the LibXML context for parsing
30:                 con = LibXML::XML::Parser::Context.file(file)
31: 
32:                 @parser           = LibXML::XML::SaxParser.new(con)
33:                 @parser.callbacks = VipHandler.new
34:                 @parser.parse
35:         end
